item.description:
The Sandy Hook tragedy has hit us all.  Bring an extra dollar or two or three to contribute to the raffle that will benefit a local agency (The Artist Collective in Hartford, CT), which is one of the organizations Ana's parents has asked us to contribute to.  TCS will be be raffling off 26 items (for the 26 lives taken at Sandy Hook) at Step it Up Saturdays @ TCS.  $1 per raffle ticket

 

 

ZUMBA FITNESS SATURDAYS WITH JEANNE!

Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

56 Arbor St, Suite 103 , Hartford, CT

(It is in the same building as Real Artways)

Bring Water, towel, and sneakers without a lot of tread.

Featuring: Salsa, Cumbia, Merengue, Flamenco, Samba, Belly Dance, Tango, Hip Hop, Raggae, Raggaeton, Bachata, Quebradita, Indian, Rock-N-Roll, R&B Grooves, Abs, Body Sculpting, Boxing, and who knows what else!). $5 Drop in Fee; $40 for 10-Class Card.  Directions: I-84 West, Sission Avenue Exit, Take a left on Sission Ave. Take a left on Capitol Ave. The 3rd right is Arbor St.  It is in the same buildingas Real Artways.  Use the side green door entrance.  There is plenty of parking in the back.
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the same building as the Real Artways

group.name: Zumba Fitness @ The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.name: Zumba Fitness for Ana Marquez Greene
